ai-anya-e0105n13:1_0: Furthermore, suppose a buffaloes were to obtain a gathering of cows, a buffaloes, plagued expert in the color of cows, and placed on their neck.
ai-anya-e0105n13:1_1: But when you transformed to the senior monks by a big trapper, for the transformation and for the senior monks, they walked together, a good hungry, and place them on the last side. After hearing their bed, weigh up.”
ai-anya-e0105n13:1_2: Sālavatī there was a great offering of the senior mendicants who went to the southern hills.
ai-anya-e0105n13:1_3: He had the most senior monk called Pañcakaṅga, who had been ordained for that life.
ai-anya-e0105n13:1_4: And they made a dancer, a line drawn nearby to the kings. Then they placed it in a forest grove on the bank of the river.
